    <div class="control-group">
      <label class="control-label" for="textinput">Domain</label>
      <div class="controls">
        <input id="textinput" name="textinput" type="text" class="input-xlarge" ng-model="bucket.projectName"></div>
    </div>
    <hr>    
    <div class="control-group">
      <label class="control-label" for="appendedtext">Choose Private Storage Drive Size</label>
      <div class="controls">
        <div class="input-append">
          <input id="appendedtext" name="appendedtext" class="input-mini" placeholder="2" type="number" ng-model="bucket.storage">    
          <span class="add-on">GB</span>
        </div>

      </div>
    </div>
    <hr>    
    <div class="control-group">
      <label class="control-label" for="checkboxes">Choose Hosting Location</label>
      <div class="controls">
        <div class="btn-group">
          <button type="button" class="btn btn-selector" ng-model="bucket.locations[0]" btn-checkbox>Ghent, Belgium</button>
          <button type="button" class="btn btn-selector" ng-model="bucket.locations[1]" btn-checkbox>Bruges, Belgium</button>
          <button type="button" class="btn btn-selector" ng-model="bucket.locations[2]" btn-checkbox>Lenoir, NC, USA</button>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
